name: The extralinguistic Tale of the Pink Short Princess
name_original: The extralinguistic Tale of the Pink Short Princess
description:
The game is about 15 minutes long. Because it is so short you cannot save. It is just a little fan project made in gamemaker, but if you are interested in some behind the scenes you can check out my Youtube channel or my Twitch.  

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXe00APH0fgg8XvN3sPh3nQ

https://www.twitch.tv/3dommaker

If you like the music you can listen to it on Soundcloud:

https://soundcloud.com/user-431976002/sets/pinkshortprincess-ost
